H0.text: For which human physical reaction is horripilation the correct medical term. Shivering

H1.text: For which human physical reaction is horripilation the correct medical term. Sweating

H2.text: For which human physical reaction is horripilation the correct medical term. Blushing

H3.text: For which human physical reaction is horripilation the correct medical term. Goosebump

A4.text: The reflex of producing goose bumps is known as horripilation.
